title: 03/23/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/23/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why he thinks both Aaron Rodgers and Steve Kerr needed to toughen up given then current situations they are both dealing with. He also takes a look at the NFL draft and shares a surprising team that should take a quarterback in the top 5. After all the movement we’ve seen in the NFL this off season, Colin ranks his top 10 favorite moves he’s seen so far. Plus, he talks to Warriors insider Ethan Strauss to find out why Steve Kerr still cares so much about hurting Kevin Durant's feeling when he's not with the Warriors anymore.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
